title: spec: fix map key description
body:
This section of the specification:

http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go1.html#equality

...contradicts with:

"The comparison operators == and != (Â§Comparison operators) must be fully defined
for operands of the key type; thus the key type must not be a struct, array or
slice."

http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Map_types
